snippet.title: Damascus Gear: Operation Tokyo HDEdition  Trailer
snippet.description:
Mecha Hack'n'Slash "Damascus Gear: Operation Tokyo HD Edition", now appearing in full HD graphics on PlayStation®4!
Ride in the Anti-RAGE Weapon System "Gears", destroy enemies, salvage for parts and upgrade your Gears, and reclaim the world!

Title: Damascus Gear: Operation Tokyo HDEdition
ReleaseDate:2017/5/31
Genre: Mech Customization
Players: 1 Player
Platform: PlayStation®4
Price: $14.99 USD , €9.99
Rating: ESRB: T(Violence,Language)　PEGI: 12+(Bad Language)
